title: Nuveen New Jersey Quality Municipal Income Fund (NXJ) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen New Jersey Quality Municipal Income Fund ( NXJ  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.054 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NXJ prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 10th quarter that NXJ has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $14.55, the dividend yield is 4.45%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NXJ was $14.55, representing a -1.82% decrease from the 52 week high of $14.82 and a 17.91% increase over the 52 week low of $12.34.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NXJ Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
